title: Entity Distance
description: Allows the user to adjust the (client) distance at which different entities render.
body:
Allows the user to adjust the (client) distance at which different entities render. Distance setting for each entity can be found in the mod's Mod Menu settings.
</br></br>
Requires [fabric-api](https://modrinth.com/mod/fabric-api), [Mod Menu](https://modrinth.com/mod/modmenu), and [Cloth Config](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/cloth-config).
